evidence.text: enjoin and set aside Defendant Corporation for National and Community Service’s imposition of grant requirements beyond those authorized by its own rules
injunctive and declaratory relief requiring Americorps to comply with its own rules and the Constitution.

evidence.text: subject matter jurisdiction pursuant to 28 U.S.C. § 1331 because this Action arises under the Constitution and laws of the United States.
Venue is proper in this District under 28 U.S.C. § 1391(e)(1) because Americorps is an “agency of the United States” headquartered in this District.
